recipe.title: Mâche, Frisée, and Radish Salad with Mustard Vinaigrette
ingredients: 2 cups loosely packed frisée (French curly endive), torn into bite-size pieces (from 1 head)
4 medium radishes, trimmed and thinly sliced
instructions: Whisk together mustard, shallot, sugar, salt, pepper, and vinegar in a small bowl, then add oil in a slow stream, whisking until emulsified. Just before serving, toss salad ingredients with just enough vinaigrette to coat and season with salt and pepper.
